    level="1"
    right="Item 13+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blade of Four Energies](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1042)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 180 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shifting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=302) [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)_ is formed of rapidly vibrating air and magical energy, though it uses the same statistics as iron. The wooden hilt is adorned with four gems, representing the energies of acid, cold, fire, and electricity, that sparkle in sequence at random intervals.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per round;   **Effect** You draw magical energy from one of the gems. Roll 1d4. Until the start of your next turn, the weapon gains the corresponding rune: 1—[_corrosive_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=292), 2—[_flaming_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295), 3—[_frost_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296), or 4—[_shock_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303).

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, envision;  **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** The blade has an energy rune from the first activation; **Effect** You call upon the energy stored in the blade to explode outward. The blade of four energies casts a 5th-level spell that depends on the active rune: [_acid arrow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2) for _corrosive_, [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) for _flaming_, [_cone of cold_](/Spells.aspx?ID=47) for _frost_, or [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) for _shock_, with a DC of 30 and spell attack bonus of +20.

Blade of Four Energies (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 180 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 20,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The blade is a _+3 greater striking shifting shortsword_ and gains the _greater corrosive_, _greater flaming_, _greater frost_, or _greater shock_ runes instead of their base versions. When Activated to Cast a Spell, the blade casts the spell heightened to 7th level, and the DC is 38.
